name: .FH File Extension
summary: Learn about .FH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: "File history" backup file created by Backup Exec, a backup application for small to medium-sized businesses; stores backup data for a physical or virtual computer system; saved as part of a "Catalog," which is a collection of files backed up at a specific time.

content: FH files are used for performing file system restores in the advent data is lost or corrupted. They are saved with other file types that together comprise the backup.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
